channel.title: Wth?
channel.description:
I dont believe there was any griefing done but who and why did someone leave signs at the site of falador?
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/17873459/Screenshot%20-%2001122011%20-%2011%3A56%3A16%20PM.png[/img]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/17873459/Screenshot%20-%2001122011%20-%2011%3A56%3A30%20PM.png[/img]
I believe you are looking for someone else. And if you are not looking for someone else and indeed are looking for me what did i do? I have never griefed, offended anyone, or broke any rules. so what possible would someone be mad at me for?
edit: if the pix still do not show. ill fix in the morning. im heading to bed. i dont know how to share pix from dropbox via the web interface--I do inside windows though, but i am using xubuntu and i dont see any options to do so. nvm i think i fixed it.

item.title: Wth?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:24, topic:378150”]set up sum traps lol

Eh there is a place called falador? Since wen?[/quote]

since after varrock was made. but its far from finished. since im the only one working on it and i dont have the time to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Wth?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:21, topic:378150”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=474033.msg3486338#msg3486338 date=1296603123]
and then i realized… all i wanted to do was kick a fuckin door down
[/quote]I NEVER WANTED TO DO A B&E.

This guy placing signs is like Dane Cook, all he wanted to do was mindfuck you and touch nothing in your home.[/quote]
Now to prove you wrong he’s totally going to tear some shit up.

Read full topic

item.title: Wth?
item.dc:creator: @loverboyg6 loverboyg6
item.description:
@loverboyg6 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:18, topic:378150”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=474033.msg3486343#msg3486343 date=1296603527]
Not gonna lie, it’s funny. Plus it’s harmless. He’s basically giving you free wood.
[/quote]
1 sign != all the shit he’s losing from the grief.[/quote]

xryz:

he didnt greif fally but someone griefed my house, which is a distance from fally. they didnt to anything really bad but they still griefed.

I wouldn’t assume those are the same person then i.e. proof that it was. If this guy likes to leave signs, he probably would have done the same to your house.

Read full topic

item.title: Wth?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Project Epic, post:1, topic:380880”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=474033.msg3486322#msg3486322 date=1296602544]

Can’t david check who placed certain blocks?
[/quote]If Moparisthebest adds the plugins, yes.

But xryz, they are signs to scare you. Making these threads is probably what he wants you to do, because it proves that it bothers you. Take down the signs and let it go.

Dude, Who cares about stupid signs, if someone griefes you anyway, just let it go, if your scared of these signs… i think your two years old and thinks he is coming to murder you in real life.[/quote]

im not scared it just pisses me off someone thinks its funny to do something like that. imho i think the kid watches to much dane cook a little b&e.

Read full topic

item.title: Wth?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Lin:

Also xryz, a griefer is just a troll in Minecraft. No sole intention except to show their stupidity and how pathetic they are. They don’t have to know you, and they don’t have to care. Simply useless creatures.[/quote][quote=“Speljohan, post:29, topic:377092”]Fix the griefer “problem” and i’ll never play. Non-consuental pvp and destruction is neccessary for fun, otherwise you might as well play creative mode.

Also xryz, a griefer is just a troll in Minecraft. No sole intention except to show their stupidity and how pathetic they are. They don’t have to know you, and they don’t have to care. Simply useless creatures.
